import React from 'react'; import { FaMapMarkerAlt, FaPhone, FaClock, FaCar } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Stores = () => { const stores = [ { id: 1, name: "AYNEXT Paris Centre", address: "123 Rue de Rivoli, 75001 Paris", phone: "+33 1 23 45 67 89", hours: "Lun-Sam: 10h-20h, Dim: 11h-19h", parking: "Parking public à 100m", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1441986300917-64674bd600d8?w=600" }, { id: 2, name: "SHADOWHOOD Champs-Élysées", address: "456 Avenue des Champs-Élysées, 75008 Paris", phone: "+33 1 23 45 67 90", hours: "Lun-Sam: 10h-21h, Dim: 11h-20h", parking: "Parking souterrain disponible", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1542272604-787c3835535d?w=600" }, { id: 3, name: "SHADOWHOOD Marais", address: "789 Rue des Archives, 75004 Paris", phone: "+33 1 23 45 67 91", hours: "Lun-Sam: 10h-19h, Dim: 12h-18h", parking: "Stationnement rue disponible", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1509631179647-0177331693ae?w=600" } ]; return (

Nos Magasins

Découvrez nos boutiques près de chez vous

{stores.map((store) => (
Ouvert

{store.name}

Adresse

{store.address}

Téléphone

{store.phone}

Horaires

{store.hours}

Parking

{store.parking}

))}
{/* Section Carte */}

Trouvez le magasin le plus proche

Carte interactive des magasins

); }; export default Stores;
